info.title: DAMS Collection API
info.description: An API for interactings with the DAMS

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: List of ids of entities to return

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Only return specified fiels in output. Only works for output in CSV-format

parameters.name: asc
parameters.description: Sort direction, ascending when 1, descending when 0

parameters.name: create_mediafile
parameters.description: Create empty mediafile together with entity

parameters.name: mediafile_filename
parameters.description: Filename for the to-be created mediafile

requestBody.description: Entity object that needs to be added

400.description: Entity doesn't have a valid format

requestBody.description: Filter that needs to be executed

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Only return specified fiels in output. Only works for output in CSV-format

400.description: Entity doesn't have a valid format
Entity doesn't have a valid format

key.description: Key of metadata to apply query on

relation_types.description: The relation to be within threshold of MinMaxFilter

metadata_field.description: The metadata field to be within threshold of MinMaxFilter

parent.description: The parent entity in which the query will be executed. Only work in combination with Mongo backend.

item_types.description: Item types to return, or relation types to search in, in case of a MultiSelectFilter

metadata.description: Structure for a single metadata item in the generic list

relation.description: Structure for a single relation item in the generic list

key.description: id to which this relation goes
